text: The Hangover Part III is a 2013 American comedy movie directed by Todd Phillips. It marked the third and final installment of the trilogy. == Cast == * Zach Galifianakis as Alan Garner * Bradley Cooper as Phil Wenneck * Ed Helms as Dr. Stu Price * Ken Jeong as Mr. Leslie Chow * Jeffrey Tambor as Syd Garner * Heather Graham as Jade * Mike Epps as Black Doug * Justin Bartha as Doug Billings * John Goodman as Marshall Category:2013 buddy movies Category:2013 comedy movies Category:2010s black comedy movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Screenplays by Todd Phillips Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Todd Phillips Category:Movies about drugs Category:2010s buddy comedy movies
title: The Hangover Part III
